trans-unit.source: Just like with full backups, in order to back up the database, you need to run Mariabackup with the --backup option to tell it to perform a backup and with the --target-dir option to tell it where to place the backup files. The target directory must be empty or not exist.
trans-unit.target: 就像完整备份一样，要备份数据库，需要使用 --backup 选项运行Mariabackup 来告诉它执行备份，而使用 --target-dir 选项运行Mariabackup 来告诉它放置备份文件的位置。 。目标目录必须为空或不存在。

trans-unit.source: Just like with full backups, the data files that Mariabackup creates in the target directory are not point-in-time consistent, given that the data files are copied at different times during the backup operation. If you try to restore from these files, InnoDB notices the inconsistencies and crashes to protect you from corruption. In fact, for partial backups, the backup is not even a completely functional MariaDB data directory, so InnoDB would raise more errors than it would for full backups. This point will also be very important to keep in mind during the restore process.
trans-unit.target: 就像完整备份一样，Mariabackup在目标目录中创建的数据文件在时间点上不一致，因为在备份操作期间数据文件在不同的时间被复制。如果您尝试从这些文件中还原，InnoDB会注意到不一致之处并崩溃以保护您免受损坏。实际上，对于部分备份，备份甚至不是一个完全可用的MariaDB数据目录，因此与完全备份相比，InnoDB会引发更多错误。在还原过程中记住这一点也非常重要。

trans-unit.source: Just like with the *.opt files, mtr will use somefile.combinations file for any somefile.test and somefile.inc that is used in testing. These files have exactly the same format as a suite combinations file.
trans-unit.target: 就像 *.opt 文件一样，mtr将对用于测试的 somefile.test 和 somefile.inc 使用 somefile.combinations 文件。这些文件与套件 combinations 文件的格式完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that if replication is set up in a scenario where each cluster node has a different server_id value, and if the replication topology is set up in such a way that a cluster node can replicate the same transactions through Galera and through MariaDB replication, then you may need to configure the cluster node to ignore these transactions when setting up MariaDB replication. You can do so by setting IGNORE_SERVER_IDS to the server IDs of all nodes in the same cluster when executing CHANGE MASTER TO. For example, this might be required when circular replication is set up between two separate clusters, and each cluster node as a different server_id value, and each cluster has log_slave_updates=ON set.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，如果在每个群集节点具有不同的 server_id 值的情况下设置了复制，并且复制拓扑的设置方式使得群集节点可以通过Galera和MariaDB复制来复制相同的事务，那么您可能需要配置集群节点以在设置MariaDB复制时忽略这些事务。您可以通过在执行 CHANGE MASTER TO 时将 IGNORE_SERVER_IDS 设置为同一集群中所有节点的服务器ID来实现。例如，当在两个单独的集群之间设置循环复制并且每个集群节点具有不同的 server_id 值并且每个集群具有 log_slave_updates=ON 时，可能需要执行此操作 组。

LIMIT will limit the number of rows deleted, which will perform the DELETE more quickly. The DELETE ... LIMIT statement can then be performed multiple times to achieve the same effect as DELETE with no LIMIT.

trans-unit.source: LIST partitioning can be useful when we have a column that can only contain a limited set of values. Even in that case, RANGE partitioning could be used instead; but LIST partitioning allows us to equally distribute the rows by assigning a proper set of values to each partition.
trans-unit.target: 当我们有一列只能包含一组有限的值时,LIST分区是很有用的。即使在这种情况下,也可以使用range分区来代替;但LIST分区允许我们通过给每个分区分配一组适当的值来平均分配行。

trans-unit.source: LIST partitioning is conceptually similar to RANGE partitioning. In both cases you decide a partitioning expression (a column, or a slightly more complex calculation) and use it to determine which partitions will contain each row. However, with the RANGE type, partitioning is done by assigning a range of values to each partition. With the LIST type, we assign a set of values to each partition. This is usually preferred if the partitioning expression can return a limited set of values.
trans-unit.target: LIST分区在概念上类似于RANGE分区。在这两种情况下，您都需要确定一个分区表达式（一个列，或者稍微复杂一些的计算），然后使用它来确定哪些分区将包含每一行。但是，对于RANGE类型，分区是通过为每个分区分配一个值范围来完成的。对于LIST类型，我们为每个分区分配一组值。如果分区表达式可以返回一组有限的值，则通常是首选方法。

trans-unit.source: LIST partitioning is used to assign each partition a list of values
trans-unit.target: LIST分区是用来给每个分区分配一个值的列表。

LOCK TABLES works on XtraDB/InnoDB tables only if the innodb_table_locks system variable is set to 1 (the default) and autocommit is set to 0 (1 is default). Please note that no error message will be returned on LOCK TABLES with innodb_table_locks = 0.
trans-unit.target: 仅当将innodb_table_locks系统变量设置为1（默认值）并将autocommit设置为0（默认值1 ）时，LOCK TABLES才能在XtraDB / InnoDB表上工作。请注意，在innodb_table_locks = 0的情况下，不会在LOCK TABLES上返回任何错误消息。

trans-unit.source: LOCK/UNLOCK TABLES — remove them. Replace them (sort of) with BEGIN ... COMMIT. (LOCK will work if innodb_table_locks is set to 1, but it is less efficient, and may have subtle issues.)
trans-unit.target: 锁定/解锁表-删除它们。将它们替换为BEGIN ... COMMIT。（如果将innodb_table_locks设置为1，则LOCK将起作用，但是效率较低，并且可能存在细微问题。）

trans-unit.source: Labels are MariaDB identifiers which can be used to identify a BEGIN ... END construct or a loop. They have a maximum length of 16 characters and can be quoted with backticks (i.e.., `).
trans-unit.target: 标签是MariaDB 标识符，可用于标识BEGIN ... END构造或循环。它们的最大长度为16个字符，并且可以用反引号（即 ` ）引起来。

trans-unit.source: Labels have a start part and an end part. The start part must precede the portion of code it refers to, must be followed by a colon (:) and can be on the same or different line. The end part is optional and adds nothing, but can make the code more readable. If used, the end part must precede the construct's delimiter (;). Constructs identified by a label can be nested. Each construct can be identified by only one label.
trans-unit.target: 标签具有开始部分和结束部分。开始部分必须由冒号之前它指的是，必须遵循的代码的一部分（ : ），并且可以在相同或不同的线路。末尾部分是可选的，不添加任何内容，但可以使代码更具可读性。如果使用，则结尾部分必须在构造的定界符（ ; ）之前。由标签标识的构造可以嵌套。每个构建体只能由一个标签识别。

trans-unit.source: Labels need not be unique in the stored program they belong to. However, a label for an inner loop cannot be identical to a label for an outer loop. In this case, the following error would be produced:
trans-unit.target: 标签在它们所属的存储程序中不需要是唯一的。但是,一个内循环的标签不能与一个外循环的标签相同。在这种情况下,会产生以下错误。

trans-unit.source: Lastly, check the firewall and SELinux. ColumnStore uses ports 8600 to 8630, as well as ports 8700 and 8800. The CDC Data Adapter uses the same ports to stream data from MaxScale-1 to ColumnStore. Check each server to ensure that there is no firewall blocking these ports. Additionally, ensure that SELinux has a policy allowing these connections or that it is running in permissive mode.
trans-unit.target: 最后，检查防火墙和SELinux。ColumnStore使用端口8600至8630以及端口8700和8800。CDC数据适配器使用相同的端口将数据从 MaxScale-1 流传输到ColumnStore。检查每台服务器，以确保没有防火墙阻止这些端口。另外，请确保SELinux具有允许这些连接的策略，或者确保它在许可模式下运行。

trans-unit.source: Lastly, the client/server protocol is very compact compared to mysql/libmysql, which reduces network usage.
trans-unit.target: 最后,与mysql/libmysql相比,客户/服务器协议非常紧凑,这减少了网络的使用。

trans-unit.source: Lastly, use the bulk command to compile the packages.

trans-unit.target: 最后，使用 maxctrl 实用程序，为Avro路由器创建一个用户，以捕获数据更改。该用户处理MaxScale从MariaDB服务器检索到ColumnStore的流数据。

trans-unit.source: Less than operator. Evaluates both SQL expressions and returns 1 if the left value is less than the right value and 0 if it is not, or NULL if either expression is NULL. If the expressions return different data types, (for instance, a number and a string), performs type conversion.
trans-unit.target: 少于运算符。计算所有两个SQL表达式并返回1，如果左边值小于右边值和0，如果不是的话，或 NULL 如果任一表达式为NULL。如果表达式返回不同的数据类型（例如，数字和字符串），则执行类型转换。

trans-unit.source: Less than or equal operator. Evaluates both SQL expressions and returns 1 if the left value is less than or equal to the right value and 0 if it is not, or NULL if either expression is NULL. If the expressions return different data types, (for instance, a number and a string), performs type conversion.
trans-unit.target: 小于或等于运算符。计算所有两个SQL表达式并返回1，如果左边的值小于或等于右值和0，如果不是的话，或 NULL 如果任一表达式为NULL。如果表达式返回不同的数据类型（例如，数字和字符串），则执行类型转换。

trans-unit.source: Let us try to understand what happened. By default the column names correspond to tag names. Because this file is rather simple, CONNECT was able to default the top tag of the table as the root node <BIBLIO> of the file, and the row tags as the <BOOK> children of the table tag. In a more complex file, this should have been specified, as we will see later. Note that we didn't have to worry about the sub-tags such as <FIRSTNAME> or <LASTNAME> because CONNECT automatically retrieves the entire text contained in a tag and its sub-tags[2].
trans-unit.target: 让我们尝试了解发生了什么。默认情况下，列名称与标签名称相对应。因为此文件非常简单，所以CONNECT能够将表的顶部标签默认为文件的根节点 <BIBLIO> ，将行标签默认为表标签的 <BOOK> 子级。在更复杂的文件中，应该已经指定了该文件，我们将在后面看到。注意，我们不必担心诸如 <FIRSTNAME> 或 <LASTNAME> 之类的子标签，因为CONNECT自动检索标签及其子标签[ 2 ]中包含的整个文本。

trans-unit.source: Let's think about what we can do with a hash of the userid. The hash could map to a bit in a bit string. A BIT_COUNT of the bit string would give the 1-bits, representing the number of users. But that bit string would have to be huge. What if we could use shorter bit strings? Then different userids would be folded into the same bit. Let's assume we can solve that.
trans-unit.target: 让我们思考一下,我们可以用userid的哈希值做什么。这个哈希值可以映射到一个比特串中的一个位。位串的BIT_COUNT将给出1位,代表用户的数量。但是这个位串必须是很大的。如果我们可以使用更短的位串呢?那么不同的userid就会被折叠到同一个bit中。让我们假设我们可以解决这个问题。

trans-unit.source: Lex (mentioned above) is the "compiled" query, that is the output from the parser and what is then interpreted to do the actual work. It constains an enum value (sql_command) which is the query type, and all the data collected by the parser needed for the execution (table names, fields, values, etc).
trans-unit.target: Lex(上面提到的)是 "编译 "的查询,是解析器的输出,然后被解释为做实际工作。它包含一个枚举值(sql_command),也就是查询类型,以及解析器收集的所有执行所需的数据(表名、字段、值等)。

trans-unit.source: Like 'Using index condition' but in addition we use batch key access to retrieve rows.
trans-unit.target: 类似于“ Using index condition ”，但除此之外，我们还使用批处理键访问来检索行。

trans-unit.source: Like 'Using where' but the where condition is pushed down to the table engine for internal optimization at the index level.
trans-unit.target: 类似于“ Using where ”，但是将where条件下推到表引擎以在索引级别进行内部优化。

trans-unit.source: Like 'Using where' but the where condition is pushed down to the table engine for internal optimization at the row level.
trans-unit.target: 类似于“ Using where ”，但是将where条件下推到表引擎以进行行级内部优化。

trans-unit.source: Like 'ref' but in addition another search for the 'null' value is done if the first value was not found. This happens usually with sub queries.
trans-unit.target: 和'ref'一样,但如果第一个值没有找到,则会再进行一次'null'值的搜索。这通常发生在子查询中。

trans-unit.source: Like --config-file, except: if first option, then read this file only, do not read global or per-user config files; should be the first option.
trans-unit.target: 和--config-file一样,除了:如果是第一个选项,则只读这个文件,不读全局或每个用户的配置文件;应该是第一个选项。

trans-unit.source: Like --zerofill but does not zero out LSN of data/index pages.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 --zerofill ,但不会将数据/索引页的LSN归零。

trans-unit.source: Like START SLAVE, this statement may be used with the IO_THREAD and SQL_THREAD options to name the thread or threads to be stopped. In almost all cases, one never need to use the thread_type options.
trans-unit.target: 与 START SLAVE 一样，此语句可以与 IO_THREAD 和 SQL_THREAD 选项一起使用，以命名要停止的一个或多个线程。在几乎所有情况下，都无需使用 thread_type 选项。

trans-unit.source: Like for BIN tables, numeric values are stored using platform internal layout, the correspondence between column types and internal format being the same than the default ones given above for BIN. However, field formats are not available for VEC tables.
trans-unit.target: 与BIN表一样,数值的存储采用平台内部布局,列类型和内部格式之间的对应关系与上面给出的BIN表默认格式相同。但是,VEC表的字段格式不可用。

trans-unit.source: Like for TBL tables, the columns of the partition table do not necessarily match the columns of the sub-tables.
trans-unit.target: 与TBL表一样,分区表的列与子表的列不一定匹配。

trans-unit.source: Like regular transactions, XA transactions create metadata locks on accessed tables.
trans-unit.target: 像常规事务一样，XA事务在访问的表上创建元数据锁。

trans-unit.source: Like with MariaDB replication, write sets that are received by a node with Galera Cluster's certification-based replication are not written to the binary log by default.
trans-unit.target: 与MariaDB复制一样，默认情况下，具有Galera Cluster基于证书的复制的节点所接收的写集不会写入二进制日志中。

trans-unit.source: Like with MariaDB replication, replication filters can be used to filter write sets from being replicated by Galera Cluster's certification-based replication. However, they should be used with caution because they may not work as you'd expect.
trans-unit.target: 与MariaDB复制一样，复制过滤器可用于过滤写入集，以免Galera Cluster基于证书的复制所复制。但是，应谨慎使用它们，因为它们可能无法按您期望的那样工作。

trans-unit.source: Like with MariaDB replication, write sets that are received by a node with Galera Cluster's certification-based replication are not written to the binary log by default. If you would like a node to write its replicated write sets to the binary log, then you will have to set log_slave_updates=ON. This is especially helpful if the node is a replication master. See Using MariaDB Replication with MariaDB Galera Cluster: Configuring a Cluster Node as a Replication Master.
trans-unit.target: 与MariaDB复制一样，默认情况下，具有Galera Cluster基于证书的复制的节点所接收的写集不会写入二进制日志中。如果希望节点将其复制的写集写入二进制日志，则必须设置 log_slave_updates=ON 。如果节点是复制主服务器，则这特别有用。请参阅将MariaDB复制与MariaDB Galera群集一起使用：将群集节点配置为复制主机。

trans-unit.source: Likewise the default wait timeout can be set:
trans-unit.target: 同样,也可以设置默认的等待超时。

trans-unit.source: Limit -- maximum number of items to return

Limit each client to approximately this number of queries. Query counting takes into account the statement delimiter. For example, if you invoke as follows, mysqlslap --delimiter=";" --number-of-queries=10 --query="use test;insert into t values(null)", the #;# delimiter is recognized so that each instance of the query string counts as two queries. As a result, 5 rows (not 10) are inserted.
trans-unit.target: 将每个客户端限制为大约此查询数量。查询计数考虑了语句定界符。例如，如果调用如下，则 mysqlslap --delimiter=";" --number-of-queries=10 --query="use test;insert into t values(null)" ，识别＃;＃分隔符，以便查询字符串的每个实例计为两个查询。结果，插入了5行（不是10行）。

trans-unit.source: Limit is used to constrain the number of rows returned by the SELECT statement. LIMIT can have up to two arguments. LIMIT must contain a rowcount and may optionally contain an offset of the first row to return (initial row is 0). The following statement returns 5 customer keys from the customer table:
trans-unit.target: LIMIT用于限制SELECT语句返回的记录数。LIMIT最多可以有两个参数,其中LIMIT必须包含一个行数,并且可以选择包含要返回的第一条记录的偏移量(初始行为0)。LIMIT必须包含一个行数,并且可以选择包含要返回的第一条记录的偏移量(初始行为0)。下面的语句从客户表中返回5个客户键。

trans-unit.source: Limit on core file size. Useful when enabling core dumps. See Configuring the Core File Size.
trans-unit.target: 核心文件大小的限制。在启用核心转储时很有用。请参阅配置核心文件大小。

trans-unit.source: Limit on how much can be locked in memory. Useful when large-pages or memlock is used
trans-unit.target: 限制可以锁定多少内存。当使用大页面或内存锁时很有用

trans-unit.source: Limit on number of open files. See Configuring the Open Files Limit.
trans-unit.target: 限制打开的文件数。请参阅配置打开文件限制。

trans-unit.source: Limit the number of core files saved (to avoid filling up disks for heavily crashing server). Defaults to 5, set to 0 for no limit. Set its default with MTR_MAX_SAVE_CORE.
trans-unit.target: 限制保存的核心文件的数量(以避免严重崩溃的服务器填满磁盘)。默认值为5,设置为0则没有限制。用MTR_MAX_SAVE_CORE设置其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Limit the number of datadir saved (to avoid filling up disks for heavily crashing server). Defaults to 20, set to 0 for no limit. Set its default with MTR_MAX_SAVE_DATDIR.
trans-unit.target: 限制保存的datadir数量(以避免严重崩溃的服务器填满磁盘)。默认值为20,设置为0则没有限制。用MTR_MAX_SAVE_DATDIR设置默认值。

trans-unit.source: Limit the number of test failurs before aborting the current test run. Defaults to 10, set to 0 for no limit. Set its default with MTR_MAX_TEST_FAIL.

trans-unit.source: Local disk on each PM can be appropriate for systems that can tolerate some down time in the event of server failure. To leverage the automated fail-over capabilities, a networked storage layer such as SAN for on premise or EBS in AWS is a better choice. A distributed filesystem such as the open source GlusterFS will also allow for node fail-over. The storage system must support files being opened with the O_DIRECT flag as the system utilizes this to optimize block caching and avoid the OS redundantly caching the same blocks.
trans-unit.target: 每个PM上的本地磁盘可以适合在服务器故障时可以容忍一些宕机时间的系统。为了利用自动故障转移功能,网络存储层,如内部的SAN或AWS中的EBS是更好的选择。分布式文件系统,如开源的GlusterFS也可以实现节点故障转移。存储系统必须支持以O_DIRECT标志打开文件,因为系统利用这个标志来优化块缓存,避免操作系统冗余缓存相同的块。

trans-unit.source: Local variable names are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 本地变量名不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Local variables are treated like stored routine parameters with respect to data type and overflow checking. See CREATE PROCEDURE.
trans-unit.target: 就数据类型和溢出检查而言，将本地变量像存储的例程参数一样对待。请参阅创建过程。

trans-unit.source: Local variables must be declared before CONDITIONs, CURSORs and HANDLERs.
trans-unit.target: 必须在 CONDITION ，CURSOR和 HANDLER 之前声明局部变量。

trans-unit.source: Lock ID number - the format is not fixed, so do not rely upon the number for information.

Lock all tables across all databases. This is achieved by acquiring a global read lock for the duration of the whole dump by executing FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK. This option automatically turns off --single-transaction and --lock-tables.
trans-unit.target: 锁定所有数据库中的所有表。这是通过执行带读锁的FLUSH TABLES在整个转储期间获取全局读锁来实现的。此选项自动关闭 --single-transaction 和 --lock-tables 。

trans-unit.source: Lock all tables for write (this disables threads).
trans-unit.target: 锁定所有表进行写入(这将禁用线程)。

trans-unit.source: Lock system log tables and statistics tables, flush them and mark them closed.
trans-unit.target: 锁定系统日志表和统计表,对其进行冲洗并标记为关闭。

trans-unit.source: Lock the binary log and commit/rollback to ensure that no changes are committed to any tables. If there are active commits or data to be copied to the binary log this will be allowed to finish.
trans-unit.target: 锁定二进制日志和提交/回滚,以确保不对任何表进行更改。如果有活动的提交或数据要复制到二进制日志,这将被允许完成。

trans-unit.source: Lock to access the delayed-insert handler thread has been received. Follows from the waiting for handler lock state and before the allocating local table state.
trans-unit.target: 已收到访问延迟插入处理程序线程的锁。从 waiting for handler lock 状态开始，然后到 allocating local table 状态之前。

trans-unit.source: Lock wait timeout exceeded; try restarting transaction
trans-unit.target: 锁定等待超时,尝试重新启动交易。

trans-unit.source: Lock's transaction ID. Matches the INNODB_TRX.TRX_ID column.
Locked record heap number if a RECORDLOCK_TYPE, or NULL if not.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 RECORD LOCK_TYPE ，则锁定记录堆号；否则为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Locked record page number if a RECORDLOCK_TYPE, or NULL if not.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 RECORD LOCK_TYPE ，则锁定记录页号；否则为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Locked record primary key as an SQL string if a RECORDLOCK_TYPE, or NULL if not. If no primary key exists, the internal InnoDB row_id number is instead used. To avoid unnecessary IO, also NULL if the locked record page is not in the buffer pool
trans-unit.target: 如果为 RECORD LOCK_TYPE ，则将记录主键锁定为SQL字符串，否则为 NULL 。如果不存在主键，则使用内部InnoDB row_id号。为避免不必要的IO，如果锁定的记录页不在缓冲池中，则也应为 NULL

trans-unit.source: Locking is lax when DDL is involved. For example, if your DML transaction uses a table, and a parallel DDL statement is started, in the normal MySQL setup it would have waited for the metadata lock, but in Galera context it will be executed right away. It happens even if you are running a single node, as long as you configured it as a cluster node. See also MDEV-468. This behavior might cause various side-effects, the consequences have not been investigated yet. Try to avoid such parallelism.
trans-unit.target: 涉及DDL时，锁定不严。例如，如果您的DML事务使用表，并且启动了并行DDL语句，则在正常的MySQL设置中，它会等待元数据锁定，但是在Galera上下文中，它将立即执行。即使您正在运行单个节点，只要将其配置为群集节点，也会发生这种情况。另请参阅MDEV-468。此行为可能会导致各种副作用，其后果尚未得到调查。尝试避免这种并行性。

trans-unit.source: Locks are acquired by a transaction to prevent concurrent transactions from modifying, or even reading, some rows or ranges of rows. This is done to make sure that concurrent write operations never collide.
trans-unit.target: 事务获取锁是为了防止并发事务修改,甚至读取某些行或行的范围。这样做的目的是为了确保并发的写操作永远不会发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: Locks are also required for auto-increments - see AUTO_INCREMENT handling in XtraDB/InnoDB.
trans-unit.target: 自动递增也需要锁-请参阅XtraDB / InnoDB中的AUTO_INCREMENT处理。

trans-unit.source: Locks may be used to emulate transactions or to get more speed when updating tables.
trans-unit.target: 锁可以用来模拟事务或在更新表时获得更多的速度。

trans-unit.source: Locks obtained with GET_LOCK() do not interact with transactions. That is, committing a transaction does not release any such locks obtained during the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 用 GET_LOCK() 获得的锁不与事务交互。也就是说，提交事务不会释放在事务期间获得的任何此类锁。

trans-unit.source: Log administrative statements (create, optimize, drop etc...)
trans-unit.target: 记录管理语句(创建、优化、删除等)。

trans-unit.source: Log audit events to a file or syslog
trans-unit.target: 将审计事件记录到文件或syslog中。

trans-unit.source: Log error details in the global error log file.
trans-unit.target: 在全局错误日志文件中记录错误详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Log file group name are case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 日志文件组名称区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Log files can also be removed automatically with the expire_logs_days system variable. This is set to 0 by default (no removal), but can be set to a time, in days, after which a binary log file will be automatically removed. Log files will only be checked for being older than expire_logs_days upon log rotation, so if your binary log only fills up slowly and does not reach max_binlog_size on a daily basis, you may see older log files still being kept. You can also force log rotation, and so expiry deletes, by running FLUSH BINARY LOGS on a regular basis. Always set expire_logs_days higher than any possible slave lag.
trans-unit.target: 日志文件也可以使用expire_logs_days系统变量自动删除。默认情况下将其设置为0（不删除），但是可以将其设置为以天为单位的时间，此后将自动删除二进制日志文件。仅在轮换日志时检查日志文件是否早于expire_logs_days，因此，如果您的二进制日志仅缓慢填充并且每天没有达到max_binlog_size，您可能会看到较旧的日志文件仍在保留。您还可以通过定期运行FLUSH BINARY LOGS来强制轮换日志，并因此删除过期。始终将expire_logs_days设置为高于任何可能的从属延迟。

trans-unit.source: Logical AND. Evaluates to 1 if all operands are non-zero and not NULL, to 0 if one or more operands are 0, otherwise NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑AND。如果所有操作数都是非零且不是NULL,则返回1,如果一个或多个操作数为0,则返回0,否则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Logical NOT. Evaluates to 1 if the operand is 0, to 0 if the operand is non-zero, and NOT NULL returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑上的NOT.如果操作数为0,则返回1;如果操作数为非零,则返回0。如果操作数为0,则返回1;如果操作数为非零,则返回0;NOT NULL返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: Logical OR. When both operands are non-NULL, the result is 1 if any operand is non-zero, and 0 otherwise. With a NULL operand, the result is 1 if the other operand is non-zero, and NULL otherwise. If both operands are NULL, the result is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑OR。当两个操作数都是非NULL时,如果任何一个操作数是非零,则结果为1,否则为0。在操作数为NULL的情况下,如果另一个操作数是非零,则结果为1,否则为NULL。如果两个操作数都是NULL,则结果为NULL。

trans-unit.source: Long transactions generate several old versions of the rows in the undo log. Those rows will probably be needed for a longer time, because other long transactions will need them. Since those transactions will generate more modified rows, a sort of combinatory explosion can be observed. Thus, the undo log requires more space.
trans-unit.target: 长事务会在undo日志中生成几个旧版本的行。这些行可能会被需要较长时间,因为其他长事务也会需要它们。由于这些事务会产生更多的修改行,所以可以观察到一种组合爆炸。因此,undo日志需要更多的空间。

trans-unit.source: Loose scan will apply for your query if EXPLAIN shows Using index for group-by in the Extra column. In this case the optimizer will do only one extra row fetch to calculate the value for MIN() or MAX() for every unique key prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果 EXPLAIN 在“ Extra 列中显示“ Using index for group-by 则松散扫描将应用于您的查询。在这种情况下，优化器将仅执行一次额外的行读取操作，以为每个唯一键前缀计算 MIN() 或 MAX() 的值。

trans-unit.source: LooseScan avoids the production of duplicate record combinations by putting the subquery table first and using its index to select one record from multiple duplicates

trans-unit.source: M is the total number of digits and D is the number of digits following the decimal point. If M and D are omitted, values are stored to the limits allowed by the hardware. A single-precision floating-point number is accurate to approximately 7 decimal places.
trans-unit.target: M是总的数字数,D是小数点后的数字数。如果省略了M和D,则会将值存储在硬件允许的范围内。一个单精度浮点数的精度约为小数点后7位。

trans-unit.source: MASTER_GTID_WAIT() allows one to specify a timeout of zero in order to do a non-blocking check to see if the slaves have progressed to a specific GTID position (MASTER_POS_WAIT() takes a zero timeout as meaning an infinite wait). To do an infinite MASTER_GTID_WAIT(), specify a negative timeout, or omit the timeout argument.
trans-unit.target: MASTER_GTID_WAIT()允许指定一个零的超时,以便做一个非阻塞的检查,看看从机是否已经进展到一个特定的GTID位置(MASTER_POS_WAIT()把零超时看作是无限的等待)。要做一个无限的MASTER_GTID_WAIT(),请指定一个负的超时,或者省略超时参数。

trans-unit.source: MASTER_GTID_WAIT() can also be used in client applications together with the last_gtid session variable. This is useful in a read-scaleout replication setup, where the application writes to a single master but divides the reads out to a number of slaves to distribute the load. In such a setup, there is a risk that an application could first do an update on the master, and then a bit later do a read on a slave, and if the slave is not fast enough, the data read from the slave might not include the update just made, possibly confusing the application and/or the end-user. One way to avoid this is to request the value of last_gtid on the master just after the update. Then before doing the read on the slave, do a MASTER_GTID_WAIT() on the value obtained from the master; this will ensure that the read is not performed until the slave has replicated sufficiently far for the update to have become visible.
trans-unit.target: MASTER_GTID_WAIT（）也可以与last_gtid会话变量一起在客户端应用程序中使用。这在读取横向扩展复制设置中很有用，在该设置中，应用程序写入单个主服务器，但将读取结果划分为多个从服务器以分配负载。在这种设置中，存在这样的风险，即应用程序可能首先在主服务器上进行更新，然后再在从服务器上进行读取，并且如果从服务器的速度不够快，则可能无法从从服务器读取数据包括刚刚进行的更新，可能会使应用程序和/或最终用户感到困惑。避免这种情况的一种方法是请求last_gtid的值在更新后的主服务器上。然后，在对从属设备进行读取之前，对从主设备获得的值进行MASTER_GTID_WAIT（）；这样可以确保在从站复制足够远以使更新变得可见之前，不执行读取。

trans-unit.source: MASTER_GTID_WAIT() can be useful to ensure that a slave has caught up to a master. Simply take the value of gtid_binlog_pos on the master, and use it in a MASTER_GTID_WAIT() call on the slave; when the call completes, the slave will have caught up with that master position.
trans-unit.target: MASTER_GTID_WAIT（）有助于确保从属服务器追上了主服务器。只需在主服务器上获取gtid_binlog_pos的值，然后在从服务器上的MASTER_GTID_WAIT（）调用中使用它即可；通话结束后，从机将赶上该主机位置。

trans-unit.source: MASTER_GTID_WAIT() can take its timeout as a floating-point value, so a timeout in fractional seconds is supported, eg. MASTER_GTID_WAIT("0-1-100", 0.5). (The minimum wait is one microsecond, 0.000001 seconds).
trans-unit.target: MASTER_GTID_WAIT()可以以浮点值的形式进行超时,所以支持以小数点秒为单位的超时,例如MASTER_GTID_WAIT("0-1-100",0.5)。(最小等待时间为1微秒,0.000001秒)。

trans-unit.source: MASTER_GTID_WAIT() does not return the number of events executed since the wait started, nor does it return NULL if a slave thread is stopped. It always returns either 0 for successful wait completed, or -1 for timeout reached (or NULL if the specified gtid-pos is NULL).
trans-unit.target: MASTER_GTID_WAIT()不返回自等待开始以来执行的事件数,如果一个从属线程被停止,它也不返回NULL。它总是返回0表示等待成功完成,或者返回-1表示超时(如果指定的gtid-pos是NULL,则返回NULL)。

trans-unit.source: MASTER_GTID_WAIT() is global; it waits for any master connection to reach the specified GTID position. MASTER_POS_WAIT() works only against a specific connection. This also means that while MASTER_POS_WAIT() aborts if its master connection is terminated with STOP SLAVE or due to an error, MASTER_GTID_WAIT() continues to wait while slaves are stopped.
trans-unit.target: MASTER_GTID_WAIT（）是全局的；它等待任何主连接到达指定的GTID位置。MASTER_POS_WAIT（）仅适用于特定连接。这也意味着，如果MASTER_POS_WAIT（）的主连接因STOP SLAVE终止或由于错误而中止，则MASTER_GTID_WAIT（）继续等待从属停止。

trans-unit.source: MED as described above is a rather complex way to achieve this goal and MariaDB does not support the ISO SQL/MED standard. But, to cover the need, possibly in transactional but mostly in decision support applications, the CONNECT storage engine supports MED in a much simpler way.

trans-unit.source: MESSAGE_TEXT is a descriptive, human-readable message. For built-in errors, parsing this string is the only way to get more information about the error. For example, parsing a message like "Table 'tab1' already exists", a program can find out that the missing table is tab1. The API function to read it is mysql_error().

trans-unit.source: MYSQL_ERRNO is the error code. Each built-in condition has a unique numeric code. 0 indicates success, but it cannot be explicitly set or read via SQL. For a list of built-in error codes, refer to MariaDB Error Codes. The API function to read it is mysql_errno().
trans-unit.target: MYSQL_ERRNO是错误代码。每个内置条件都有一个唯一的数字代码。0表示成功，但是不能通过SQL显式设置或读取。有关内置错误代码的列表，请参阅MariaDB错误代码。读取它的API函数是mysql_errno（）。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that MariaDB Server runs under the correct AWS identity that has access to the above key. For example, you can store the AWS credentials in a AWS credentials file for the user who runs mysqld. More information about the credentials file can be found in the AWS CLI Getting Started Guide.
trans-unit.target: 确保MariaDB Server在可以访问上述密钥的正确AWS身份下运行。例如，您可以将AWS凭证存储在运行 mysqld 的用户的AWS凭证文件中。有关凭证文件的更多信息，请参阅《 AWS CLI入门指南》。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the MariaDB account used for stopping the mysqld processes (with the mysqladmin utility) has the same user name and password for each server. Also, make sure that the account has the SHUTDOWN privilege. If the servers that you want to manage have different user names or passwords for the administrative accounts, you might want to create an account on each server that has the same user name and password. For example, you might set up a common multi_admin account by executing the following commands for each server:
trans-unit.target: 确保用于停止 mysqld 进程（使用 mysqladmin 实用程序）的MariaDB帐户的每台服务器具有相同的用户名和密码。另外，请确保该帐户具有 SHUTDOWN 特权。如果要管理的服务器的管理帐户具有不同的用户名或密码，则可能要在每台具有相同用户名和密码的服务器上创建一个帐户。例如，您可以通过对每个服务器执行以下命令来设置公共 multi_admin 帐户：

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the data directory for each server is fully accessible to the Unix account that the specific mysqld process is started as. If you run the mysqld_multi script as the Unix root account, and if you want the mysqld process to be started with another Unix account, then you can use use the --user option with mysqld. If you specify the --user option in an option file, and if you did not run the mysqld_multi script as the Unix root account, then it will just log a warning and the mysqld processes are started under the original Unix account.
trans-unit.target: 确保启动特定 mysqld 进程的Unix帐户可以完全访问每个服务器的数据目录。如果您以Unix root 帐户的身份运行 mysqld_multi 脚本，并且希望以另一个Unix帐户启动 mysqld 进程，则可以对 mysqld 使用 --user 选项。如果在选项文件中指定 --user 选项，并且没有将 mysqld_multi 脚本作为Unix root 帐户运行，则它将仅记录一条警告，并且 mysqld 进程将在原始Unix帐户下启动。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the size is not too large, causing swapping. The benefit of a larger buffer pool size is more than undone if your operating system is regularly swapping.
trans-unit.target: Veillez à ce que la taille ne soit pas trop grande,ce qui entraînerait un échange.L'avantage d'une plus grande taille du pool de tampons est plus qu'annulé si votre système d'exploitation procède régulièrement à des échanges.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you're using GNU utils for building, including make, cmake, gcc, gawk, getopt, autotools, libtool, automake, autoconf and bazaar.
trans-unit.target: Assurez-vous que vous utilisez les utils GNU pour la construction,y compris make,cmake,gcc,gawk,getopt,autotools,libtool,automake,autoconf et bazaar.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that your operating system can cope with the number of open file descriptors required by the table_open_cache setting. If table_open_cache is set too high, MariaDB may start to refuse connections as the operating system runs out of file descriptors. Also note that the MyISAM (and Aria?) storage engines need two file descriptors per open table.
trans-unit.target: Assurez-vous que votre système d'exploitation peut gérer le nombre de descripteurs de fichiers ouverts requis par le paramètre table_open_cache.Si le paramètre table_open_cache est trop élevé,MariaDB peut commencer à refuser des connexions car le système d'exploitation est à court de descripteurs de fichiers.Notez également que les moteurs de stockage MyISAM (et Aria ?)ont besoin de deux descripteurs de fichiers par table ouverte.

trans-unit.source: Manual heuristic recovery occurs when --tc-heuristic-recover is set to some value other than OFF. This might be needed if the server finds prepared transactions during crash recovery that are not in the transaction coordinator log. For example, the error log might contain an error like this:
